Primary Contact: Bren Witt, Executive Director; Phone: 250.762.0607; Email: info@kelownaprostate.com
Service Details: - Provides counselling and information, for both men and women, on prostate problems and male health issues- Offers information, including books, booklets, brochures, pamphlets, audio tapes and videos specifically relating to diseases of the prostate gland, male health problems, and prostate cancer- Facilitates the Kelowna Prostate Cancer Support and Awareness Group
Meetings: Kelowna Prostate Cancer Support & Awareness Group:  - Meets on the 2nd Sat of each month from 9:00am - 11:00am at the Holiday Express Hotel, Conference Room, 2429 Hwy 97 N, Kelowna (corner of Banks Rd and Hwy 97)- Note:  no meetings in Jul-Aug
